66 /*========== Static Constant and Variable Definitions =======================*/
67 
68 /*========== Extern Constant and Variable Definitions =======================*/
69 /** array of algorithms that should be executed */
70 ALGO_TASKS_s algo_algorithms[] = {
71  {ALGO_UNINITIALIZED, 100, 1000, 0, NULL_PTR, &ALGO_MovAverage},
72 };
73 
74 const uint16_t algo_length = sizeof(algo_algorithms) / sizeof(algo_algorithms[0]);
75 
76 /*========== Static Function Prototypes =====================================*/
77 
78 /*========== Static Function Implementations ================================*/
79 
80 /*========== Extern Function Implementations ================================*/
81 
82 extern void ALGO_MarkAsDone(uint32_t algorithmIndex) {
83  FAS_ASSERT(algorithmIndex < algo_length);
84  if (algo_algorithms[algorithmIndex].state == ALGO_REINIT_REQUESTED) {
85  /* do not alter state if a reinit request is pending */
86  } else if (algo_algorithms[algorithmIndex].state != ALGO_BLOCKED) {
87  algo_algorithms[algorithmIndex].state = ALGO_READY;
88  } else {
89  /* algo is in "blocked" state, nothing to do here */
90  }
91 }
92 
93 extern void ALGO_MarkAsReinit(uint32_t algorithmIndex) {
94  FAS_ASSERT(algorithmIndex < algo_length);
95  OS_EnterTaskCritical();
96  algo_algorithms[algorithmIndex].state = ALGO_REINIT_REQUESTED;
97  OS_ExitTaskCritical();
98 }
99 
100 /*========== Externalized Static Function Implementations (Unit Test) =======*/
101 #ifdef UNITY_UNIT_TEST
102 #endif
